docs.text: grid-fit Documentation Installation Python You can install the Python bindings using pip (after building): pip install . R You can install the R package using devtools (after building): # In R install.packages("devtools") devtools::install("path/to/grid-fit") Usage Example Python import gridfit # Interpolate between 0 and 1 with 1 interval result = gridfit.interp(0, 1, 1) print(result) # [0.5] R library(gridfit) # Interpolate between 0 and 1 with 1 interval result <- interp(0, 1, 1) print(result) # [0.5] For more details, see the README or source code.
docs.title: grid-fit Documentation

docs.text: You can install the Python bindings using pip (after building): pip install .

docs.text: You can install the R package using devtools (after building): # In R install.packages("devtools") devtools::install("path/to/grid-fit")

docs.title: Python

docs.text: library(gridfit) # Interpolate between 0 and 1 with 1 interval result <- interp(0, 1, 1) print(result) # [0.5] For more details, see the README or source code.
